description: A configuration file for building the ConnMan network management daemon in a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It contains metadata, dependency declarations, build options, package definitions, and auxiliary scripts for integrating and managing ConnMan within embedded Linux systems.

methods.name: __anonymous
methods.description: Defines systemd packages based on build options, adding vpn package if VPN support is enabled.

methods.name: add_rdepends
methods.description: Adds runtime dependencies for plugin packages based on dependency map and package type.
